Dayda

City of New York

This is a catalog of datasets organized and made more accessible from the City of New York, providing simple dowloadable CSV and JSON files, as well as Postman Collections you can use as part of workflows and other automation.

    Update to Submitted State Aid Projects

    List of projects in substantial completion with the final aid amount requested.

    Upcoming contracts to be awarded (CIP)

    Current report not available pending SCA program On Pause. New school projects Capital Improvement Projects (CIP) that will complete design within the next 6 months and will be available for bid.

    Upcoming contracts to be awarded (CAP)

    Current report not available pending SCA program On Pause. New school projects (Capacity) that will complete design within the next 6 months and will be available for bid.

    Trust Fund Invasions

    A list of all home improvement business and tow truck industry trust fund invasions, which are used to cover certain unpaid consumer restitution awards or fines.

    Traffic Volume Counts (2014-2019)

    Traffic volume counts collected by DOT for New York Metropolitan Transportation Council (NYMTC) to validate the New York Best Practice Model (NYBPM).
